# PullDownMenuBarExtraStyle

**Structure**

A menu bar extra style that renders its contents as a menu that pulls down from the icon in the menu bar.

## Declaration

```swift
struct PullDownMenuBarExtraStyle
```

## Overview

Use [doc://com.apple.SwiftUI/documentation/SwiftUI/MenuBarExtraStyle/menu] to construct this style.

## Creating the menu bar extra style

- **init()**: Creates a pull down menu bar extra style.

## Supporting types

- **AutomaticMenuBarExtraStyle**: The default menu bar extra style. You can also use [doc://com.apple.SwiftUI/documentation/SwiftUI/MenuBarExtraStyle/automatic] to construct this style.
- **WindowMenuBarExtraStyle**: A menu bar extra style that renders its contents in a popover-like window.

## Conforms To

- MenuBarExtraStyle
